name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PatchTagger - Save Videos by Adding Tags

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create collections of videos for inspiration. Categorize and search later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ Save videos by adding tags

This chrome extension allows you to add tags to videos that you want to save for inspiration.

✨ Easy to use

The extnesion adds a sidebar on supported websites. So just click it and save the video.

✨ Search, sort and randomize

We provide a simple and intuitive interface for you to search through your library of videos.
